languages.text: "Ирлиэт, что за противоестественное существо обретается на корабле Вольного Торговца? Ты пробыла на борту дольше меня — ты должна знать ответ".
"Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, что за противоестественное существо обретается на корабле Вольного Торговца? Ты пробыла на борту дольше меня — ты должна знать ответ".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，住在行商浪人船上的那只古怪生物是什么？你在船上的时间比我长，你肯定知道答案。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，住在行商浪人船上的那只古怪生物是什么？你在船上的时间比我长，你肯定知道答案。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Yrliet, quelle est cette étrange créature qui réside sur le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? Vous devez le savoir, vous qui êtes à bord depuis plus longtemps que moi. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, quelle est cette étrange créature qui réside sur le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? » Vous devez le savoir, vous qui êtes à bord depuis plus longtemps que moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Yrliet, ¿qué es esa criatura antinatural que mora en la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? Llevas más tiempo que yo a bordo, así que imagino que sabes la respuesta».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, ¿qué es esa criatura antinatural que mora en la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? Llevas más tiempo que yo a bordo, así que imagino que sabes la respuesta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ユリエット、自由開拓者の船に住み着いている不自然な生物は何だ？お前は俺より長く船にいた…何か知ってるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、自由開拓者の船に住み着いている不自然な生物は何だ？お前は俺より長く船にいた…何か知ってるはずだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Yrliet, was ist das für eine unnatürliche Kreatur, die auf dem Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haust? Ihr seid schon länger an Bord als ich, Ihr müsst doch die Antwort kennen."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, was ist das für eine unnatürliche Kreatur, die auf dem Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} haust? Ihr seid schon länger an Bord als ich, Ihr müsst doch die Antwort kennen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in gemisindeki o doğa dışı yaratık ne Yrliet? Sen benden uzun zamandır gemidesin, cevabı biliyor olmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, what is the unnatural creature residing on the Rogue Trader's ship? You have been aboard longer than I have — you must know the answer."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in gemisindeki o doğa dışı yaratık ne Yrliet? Sen benden uzun zamandır gemidesin, cevabı biliyor olmalısın."
